fullplot: Harley loves Ilya. He gives her life purpose and sets her passion ablaze. So, when he asks her to prove her love by slitting her wrists, she obliges with only mild hesitation, perhaps because of her other all-consuming love: heroin.

title: Heaven Knows What
writers: Arielle Holmes (inspired by a book written by)
